alert.note: Alert for Bertie; Camden; Chowan; Gates; Hertford; Northampton; Pasquotank; Perquimans; Western Currituck (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued March 20 at 5:35AM EDT until March 20 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EDT THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the first Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25 to 28 degrees expected for interior area of southeast Virginia and northeast North Carolina. Low temperatures of 30 to 32 degrees are expected near the immediate coast and in urban areas of Hampton Roads. For the second Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25 to 30 degrees expected. * WHERE...Portions of northeast North Carolina and southeast Virginia. * WHEN...For the first Freeze Warning, until 9 AM EDT this morning. For the second Freeze Warning, from midnight tonight to 9 AM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Bertie; Camden; Chowan; Gates; Hertford; Northampton; Pasquotank; Perquimans; Western Currituck
